Class RectangleEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jfree.ui.RectangleEdge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class RectangleEdge
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Used to indicate the edge of a rectangle.
    Author:
    David Gilbert
    See Also:
